eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Pima, AZ; AT 10:31 AM ON SEP 29, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 06:32 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Tucson, Arizona. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. The Tucson Police Department is looking for Arthur Manzano. He is described as a 79-year-old Hispanic male, 5 feet 7 inches tall, 170 pounds, with brown eyes and salt and pepper hair. Mr. Manzano suffers from a condition causing memory loss and confusion. Mr. Manzano was last seen in the area of 5500 block of East Lee Street, Tucson, Arizona on September 28, 2025, around 2:15 PM. He is believed to be wearing either a T-shirt or plaid shirt, with blue jeans and white shoes. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
